articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Condemns U.S. for Mugging of Diplomatic Package of DPRK Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Condemns U.S. for Mugging of Diplomatic Package of DPRK Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The spokesman of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) gave the following answer to the question raised by the KCNA on Sunday as regards the incident in which a diplomatic package of the delegation of the DPRK was seized in New York:
					 On June 16, the delegation of the DPRK which was on its way home after attending the Conference of States Parties to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities was literally mugged at the John F. Kennedy International Airport by the U.S. authorities that forcibly took away a diplomatic package from the delegation by an illegal and heinous act of provocation.
					
					 At the airport, a group of more than 20 including those who claimed to be from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security and the police officers made a violent assault like gangsters to take away the diplomatic package from the DPRK diplomats who were in possession of a valid diplomatic courier certificate.
					
					 As the diplomats vigorously resisted, they grabbed the diplomatic package using physical violence and made off.
					
					 The fact that the gang of more than 20 was on standby waiting for the delegation in front of the boarding gate of the specific flight before making the assault leaves no doubt that this was a planned and organized provocation.
					
					 The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK regards this mugging by the U.S. as an intolerable act of infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and a malicious provocation, and strongly condemns it in the name of the government of the DPRK.
					
					 This mugging act of the U.S. serves as a graphic account telling the world how reckless and despicable the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK has become.
					
					 The U.S. should reflect on its reckless act and be fully aware of the grave consequences to follow.
					
					 Diplomats of a sovereign state are being robbed of a diplomatic package in the middle of New York where the headquarters of the United Nations is located and that serves as the venue for international meetings including the United Nations General Assembly. This clearly shows that the U.S. is a felonious and lawless gangster state.
					
					 The international community needs to seriously reconsider whether or not New York, where such an outrageous mugging is rampant, is fit to serve as the venue for international meetings.
					
					 The U.S. owes the DPRK a good explanation of its act of infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and an official apology on behalf of the U.S. government.
					
					 If the U.S. fails to give its due response to our demand which is all too reasonable and fair enough, it will be totally responsible for all the consequences to be entailed.

articles.title: U.S. Shameless Act of Pressing for THAAD Can Never Be Tolerated: National Peace Committee of Korea Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. Shameless Act of Pressing for THAAD Can Never Be Tolerated: National Peace Committee of Korea Spokesman
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- In recent days the U.S. is displeased with the revelation of the additional introduction of THAAD launching pads which it pushed forward together with the south Korean puppet military warmongers and the reassessment of the influence of THAAD upon environment of its site. It is openly bulldozing and urging the south Korean authorities into deploying THAAD.
					 Every day high-ranking politicians of the U.S. Department of State, U.S. Defense Department and Congress are "expressing their attitudes" before media, forcing the deployment of THAAD. On June 8, Trump who has now faced the crisis of impeachment said before the chiefs of diplomacy and security that "THAAD is very important for the U.S. government".
					
					 Meanwhile, high-ranking persons concerned such as the under-secretary of the U.S. Department of State flew into south Korea, urging "earlier deployment" of THAAD, and claiming that the "delayed deployment of THAAD can break the south Korea-U.S. alliance".
					
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Sunday said this is a clear revelation of the brigandish nature of the U.S. which regards south Korea as a mere colony.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities speak for candlelight demonstrators, they should come to their senses, though belatedly, and follow the south Koreans' demand for the withdrawal of THAAD deployment, not accepting the U.S. master's demand.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities allow THAAD deployment, swimming against the trend of the times, they would meet the same miserable fate as the Park Geun Hye group of traitors which met ruin for going wild for the THAAD deployment and would be deserted and rejected by history and the nation.
					
					 The U.S. brigandish act of going roughshod while pressing for the THAAD deployment for aggression can never be tolerated.

articles.title: Peaceful Development and Use of Space Are Legitimate Right of Sovereign State: DPRK Delegation
articles.content:
Peaceful Development and Use of Space Are Legitimate Right of Sovereign State: DPRK Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation clarified the following principled stand as regards the peaceful use of space at the second session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on June 15:
					 Space is wealth common to mankind. Therefore, its peaceful development and use are the legitimate right of a sovereign state recognized by international law, irrespective of size of the country and differences of political view.
					
					 The DPRK has paid primary attention to the peaceful use of space, and the space science and research including satellite launch being promoted by the DPRK in recent years according to the state space development plan are making great contribution to the economic development of the country.
					
					 All "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK fabricated by the U.S. and its vassal forces by abusing UNSC are wantonly violating the legitimate right of a sovereign state and universally recognized international law.
					
					 The DPRK's stand remains unchanged in totally rejecting the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" as they are unethical ones against civilization aimed to totally deny the Korean people's rights to existence and development and check modern civilization.
					
					 Space has faced the potential threat owing to the attempt at militarizing space by some countries who dream to dominate the world, and typical example is the development of the missile defense system being promoted by the U.S.
					
					 Space development and use should be oriented to the peaceful purpose, the DPRK delegation said, adding that the international community should check with concerted efforts the reckless attempt at space militarization in order to ensure global peace and security.

articles.title: Immediate Repatriation of DPRK Women Citizens Urged
articles.content:
Immediate Repatriation of DPRK Women Citizens Urged
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The representative of the DPRK made a speech at the 35th session of HRC being held in Geneva on June 15.
					 Today in the DPRK, dynamic struggle is under way to foil maneuvers of hostile forces to impose sanctions and pressure upon it and fully realize the dream and ideal of people by ensuring their independent rights and genuine human rights under the politics of affording priority, respect and love to the people of our respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the representative said, and went on:
					
					 While resolutely rejecting the politicization of human rights, the DPRK attaches importance to the genuine dialogue and cooperation in the international human rights field.
					
					 The HRC should no longer tolerate such human rights violations of the U.S., the worst-ever tundra of human rights in the world and the ringleader and the mastermind of human rights violations as well, but take appropriate action.
					
					 Japan is a classic state of anti-human rights crimes, thus lacking eligibility to be present in the human rights forum.
					
					 It will take ages to enumerate the human rights violations in south Korea.
					
					 Particularly the continued refusal by south Korean authorities to repatriate the 12 DPRK women citizens who were abducted by south Korean agents in April last year constitutes typical crime of abduction and large scale human rights violation in the 21st century.
					
					 My delegation urges the OHCHR and HRC to continue to pay due attention to the issue of DPRK women abductees, the contemporary form of human rights violation, and take appropriate measure to have them repatriated without delay.

articles.title: Delegation of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation led by Director Jin Xian arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Fourth Ulaanbaatar Dialogue on Northeast Asian Security International Conference Held
articles.content:
Fourth Ulaanbaatar Dialogue on Northeast Asian Security International Conference Held
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Ulaanbaatar Dialogue on Northeast Asian Security International Conference was held in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia on June 15 and 16, 2017.
					 It was co-hosted by the Mongolian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Institute for Strategic Studies of Mongolia, and was attended by delegations of the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and policy research institutes of different countries including Russia, China, Mongolia, United States and Japan, and representatives of international organizations. 
					
					 The participants had discussions on how to maintain peace and security in northeast Asia and realize economic cooperation in the region.
					
					 The delegation of the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK expounded on the reactionary and unwarranted nature of U.S. hostile policy against the DPRK and stressed the DPRK's principled stand that it would defend its peace and security on its own strength in firm defiance of U.S. highhandedness and strong-arm policy and it would readily respond to no matter what the U.S. wants.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Sunday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked Here
articles.content:
Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked Here
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Central Youth Hall Sunday on the occasion of the Day of Persons with Disabilities.
					 Present there were Jong Hyon, vice-chairperson of the C.C., the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, officials concerned, persons with disabilities and their family members, citizens, staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and overseas compatriots staying in the motherland. 
					
					 A performance was given by members of the art groups of persons with disabilities.
					
					 Put on the stage were mixed quintet "We Call You Father" and kayagum solo "Arirang" and colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively showed the true picture of the large family of socialism holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their father.
					
					 Earlier, the participants looked round photos on display.

articles.title: Papers Slam S. Korean Authorities for Mocking Public Mind-set Calling for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Papers Slam S. Korean Authorities for Mocking Public Mind-set Calling for Improved Inter-Korean Relations 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities built up ill opinion that a joint event of Koreans in the north, the south and abroad was not held due to the DPRK though it was planned to be held on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, say papers here in their commentaries on Sunday.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary says this is a mockery of public mindset calling for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification as they tried to pass the blame on to the other by misrepresenting the fact.
					
					 The failure of the joint event is attributable to the south Korean authorities' indecisive and equivocal attitude.
					
					  It is painful that the June 15 joint national event was not held though it would be significant in doing away with the catastrophic consequences of the inter-Korean relations caused by the conservative group's heinous policy of confrontation with compatriots in the north, and in opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by pooling efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' indecisive and ambiguous attitude leaves the DPRK skeptical as to their willingness to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have intention to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, they should drop the attitude of cooperating with outside forces and following their anti-reunification moves, to begin with.
					
					 Minju Joson says the south Korean authorities should not mock the entire nation and the people from all walks of life desirous of improved inter-Korean relations and peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula but show their will to implement the north-south declarations in practice.

articles.title: U.S. Uses Latest Military Hardware in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Uses Latest Military Hardware in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News on June 12, the U.S. imperialist aggressors are running amuck in a mobile drill together with the south Korean puppet army with the mobilization of the latest military hardware.
					 In February the U.S. imperialists supplied to the U.S. marines an updated multi-purpose vehicle which can ensure high mobility off-road.
					
					 The 3rd division of the U.S. marines in Okinawa is using the vehicle in the drilling grounds of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces claim that the purpose of the recent drill is aimed to establish the operation system of the vehicle suitable for the terrain of the Korean peninsula and use it in contingency.

articles.title: Korean Organization in China Calls for Removal of THAAD
articles.content:
Korean Organization in China Calls for Removal of THAAD
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on June 10 called for safeguarding the cradle of the nation from big powers' nuclear confrontation by removing THAAD.
					 The statement warned that if the south Korean authorities do not withdraw the deployment of THAAD, they would not only be abandoned by the people but also be judged by the nation and cursed by the progressives.
					
					 It stressed that all members of the regional association would stand firm against any move of outsiders for aggression to have the security of the DPRK and destiny of the nation well in hand and struggle for bringing earlier the peace and prosperity on the Korean peninsula together with 80 million fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced in Britain
Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on June 9 posted on its website "Let KCU Members Become True Sons and Daughters, Young Revolutionaries, of the Socialist Country", a speech made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Nepal and Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Nepal and Myanmar
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Nepali political party and a figure in Myanmar made public statements on June 12 and 13 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Nepal Communist Party (United) in its statement paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il on the historic day when he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il is a genius of idea and theory as he made public the immortal classical works clarifying the basic principles for the building and activities of the revolutionary Party and the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism.
					
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that Kim Jong Il led the Party, the army and the people in the DPRK to victory with his outstanding ideology, prominent leadership and noble traits for a long time, performing immortal feats before the country and revolution, times and mankind. He went on;
					
					 No great man in history could make such a great contribution to the accomplishment of the global cause of independence with extraordinary ideology and leadership as HE Kim Jong Il could.
					
					 His career was the precious one of the peerless patriot and prominent leader who devoted his all to the victorious advance of the anti-imperialist cause of independence.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il, the great statesman, is boundlessly revered not only by the Korean people but also by the progressive mankind in the world for his feats.

articles.title: Delegacion de RPDC insiste en el desarrollo y uso del cosmos con fines pacificos
articles.content:
Delegacion de RPDC insiste en el desarrollo y uso del cosmos con fines pacificos
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- En la sesion plenaria del segundo periodo de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme, celebrada el dia 15, la delegacion coreana expuso la siguiente posicion de principios sobre el uso pacifico del cosmos.
					 El cosmos es la propiedad comun de toda la humanidad y su desarrollo y uso con fines pacificos es el derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano reconocido por la ley internacional sin distincion del tamano del pais, el criterio politico, etc.
					
					  La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presta primordial atencion al uso del espacio con fines pacificos y el lanzamiento de satelites y otros trabajos de investigacion de la ciencia espacial que se impulsan en los ultimos anos segun el plan del desarrollo aeroespacial del Estado, hacen gran aporte al desarrollo de la economia del pais.
					
					  Todas las "resoluciones de sanciones" anti-RPDC inventadas por EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU despreciaron flagrantemente los derechos legitimos del Estado soberano y las leyes internacionales reconocidas.
					
					  Sobre todo, estas "resoluciones" constituyen el acto antietico y anti-civilizacion que niega totalmente los derechos a vivir y desarrollar del pueblo coreano y destruye la civilizacion moderna, razon por la cual la RPDC las rechaza total e invariablemente.
					
					  Hoy dia, el cosmos tropieza con la amenaza potencial debido a la intencion de militarizacion de algunos paises que abrigan la heguemonia del mundo. Lo comprueba el desarrollo del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU.
					
					  Debe ser estrictamente pacifico el objetivo del desarrollo y uso del cosmos y la sociedad internacional debe frenar con la accion unida la intencion imprudente de militarizacion a partir del punto de vista del mantenimiento de la paz y la seguridad del mundo.

articles.title: Efectuado 4o Dialogo de Ulan Bator sobre Seguridad de Noreste Asiatico
articles.content:
Efectuado 4o Dialogo de Ulan Bator sobre Seguridad de Noreste Asiatico
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Bajo coauspicios del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y el Instituto de Estrategia, de Mongolia, tuvo lugar los dias 15 y 16 en el Ulan Bator de Mongolia el 4o Dialogo de Ulan Bator sobre la Seguridad de Noreste Asiatico.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion la delegacion del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del MINREX de la RPDC y otras de las instituciones de estudio de la politica de Rusia, China, Mongolia, Estados Unidos, Japon y otros paises y los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales.
					
					Se discutieron los asuntos de medidas para garantizar la paz y la seguridad de la region del Noreste Asiatico y realizar las cooperaciones economicas.
					
					Tras revelar el caracter reaccionario y la ilegitimidad de la politica hostil a la RPDC del pais norteamericano, la parte coreana expuso la posicion de principios de la RPDC de defender con su propia fuerza la paz y la seguridad del Estado haciendo frente rotundo a la arbitrariedad y el despotismo de EE.UU. y responder con gusto a todas las formas que desee EE.UU.
